Name: Arcane Zeal
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) You gain 1 Energy (maximum 1...6...7) for each enchantment on you whenever you cast a spell.

Name: Armor of Sanctity
Description: Enchantment Spell. Inflicts Weakness condition on all adjacent foes (5...13...15 seconds). You take 5...17...20 less damage from foes with a condition. (15 seconds.)

Name: Attacker's Insight
Description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (3...9...10 seconds.) Gives 50% block chance while attacking. End Effect: Causes Weakness 3...13...15 seconds to adjacent foes.

Name: Aura Slicer
Description: Melee Attack. (5...13...15 seconds.)Inflicts [*sic*] Bleeding [condition]. Also inflicts Cracked Armor (1...8...10 seconds).

Name: Aura of Holy Might
Description: Enchantment Spell. (45 seconds.) Whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment

Name: Aura of Thorns
Description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

Name: Aura of Thorns (PvP)
Description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Initial effect: inflicts Bleeding condition (5...13...15 seconds) on nearby foes. End effect: inflicts Crippled condition (3...7...8 seconds) on nearby foes.

Name: Avatar of Balthazar
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You gain +20 armor against physical damage
Activation: you inflict Burning (1...3...3 seconds) on nearby foes whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Dwayna
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You deal holy damage. Whenever you use a Dervish attack skill
Adrenaline: you lose 1 hex. Heal allies in earshot for 5...41...50 Health when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Dwayna (PvP)
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Deal holy damage. You lose 1 hex whenever you use a Dervish attack skill. Heal yourself for 5...41...50 Health whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Grenth
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Your scythe attacks deal dark damage and steal 0...10...12 Health. You are immune to Disease. Apply Disease to all adjacent foes (3 seconds) when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Lyssa
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) Your Dervish enchantments recharge 50% faster and deal chaos damage with attacks. Steal 1 Energy from nearby foes when you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Melandru
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You have +150 maximum Health
Energy: and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 1 condition from all party members in earshot whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Avatar of Melandru (PvP)
Description: Elite Form. (10...74...90 seconds.) You have +100 maximum Health
Energy: and your attacks deal earth damage. Cure 2 conditions from yourself whenever you lose a Dervish enchantment. This skill is disabled for 45 seconds.

Name: Balthazar's Rage
Description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (20 seconds.) Initial Effect: Inflicts burning (1...3...3 seconds) on nearby foes. End Effect: gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline if any foes are within earshot.

Name: Banishing Strike
Description: Melee Attack. Deals 10...50...60 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Description: Flash Enchantment Spell. (30 seconds.) Your attacks deal earth damage. Initial effect: deals 10...34...40 earth damage to adjacent foes. End effect: inflicts Blindness condition (1...3...4 seconds) on adjacent foes.
